__e: You're just an innocent drug mule, is that what you're saying?
As he likes to tell it, I'm the workhorse.
Why, you's nothing more than a white man's mule in a white man's war.
Yeah, well you just wait until you've had a son and you've planned and worked for him like a dog and it all comes to nothing.
One walks out, another obstinate as a mule, and you're scared of the dark.
Yep, that's true, but when it came down to it the fellow who owned the mule and the land had rather keep it all for himself so nothing really ever happened with it
